scripts.generate:openapi: node scripts/auto-discover-models.js && cd cmd && swag init --output ../docs --parseDependency && cd .. && npx swagger2openapi docs/swagger.yaml --outfile docs/openapi.yaml
scripts.generate:types: npx openapi-typescript docs/openapi.yaml --output src/typescript/types.ts && node scripts/add-type-exports.js
scripts.generate: npm run generate:openapi && npm run generate:types && cd src/typescript && npm run build
